newsitem.title: UK: IEA to send senior delegation to China.
newsitem.headline: IEA to send senior delegation to China.

text.p: The International Energy Agency (IEA) is sending a senior delegation to China to study ways to enhance future contacts, the OPEC News Agency (OPECNA) said.

IEA Executive Director Robert Priddle will lead the delegation which will be in China from October 28 until November 5 at the invitation of the chairman of China's state planning commission, Chen Jin Hua.

The IEA said the mission "reflects both the expanding role of the agency in building ties with those of the world's most significant energy market participants who are not members of the iea, and rapid development of China's role in the world economy."
The Paris-based IEA draws its membership from members of the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD).
